body:
@steveklabnik yeah, my interest on developing on rails-2-3 comes from an attempt to **facilitate the upgrade to 3**.

**Of course I have a specific app** (40k loc, 85 gems, 6 plugins) I have to migrate, but there's a ton of apps out here that are in the same situation out there, I would like to do something for them too. I want to push for progress (as in @dhh's speech)

**I would warmly welcome a rails-2.4** with upgraded requirements about rubygems version, bundler integration and other stuff like this (e.g. support for rspec2). 

**If I get from @rails core some kind of green light** on this I can go on adding more fixes/upgrades like this, I'm also quite sure that I can find some other developers interested in this.

Sorry for the lengthy ran… err… comment :D
